#include <stdio.h>
#define max 1000000 
#define MOD 100000007

int main()
{
int fall, t, i;
long N, F[max+1];

for(t=1; t<=max; F[t++]=1);
for(t=2; t<=max/2; t++)
	for(i=t; i+t<= max;)
		{
		F[i+=t]+=F[i-t];
		if(F[i]>=MOD)
			F[i]-=MOD;
		}
for(scanf("%d",&fall); fall--; scanf("%ld", &N), printf("%ld\n", F[N]));

return 0;
}
